name: sigurd
normalized: what's wrong!?
are you all too afraid to draw near!?
before the gate, sigurd stared down her many enemies.

name: flungruni
normalized: someone!
anyone!
is their no one who would defeat this shrewd valkyrie!?
flungruni, growing impatient that not one of his army had been able to defeat the valkyrie even though more than two hours had passed, raised his voice.
however, nobody responded to his cries.
all who would dare to challenge sigurd's overwhelming power had died.

name: sigurd
normalized: hmph, flungruni.
it would seem your subordinates are only so in body, not in spirit.
they all appear ready to flee.
she swung her blood-soaked blade once and grinned broadly.

name: sigurd
normalized: haa!
sigurd withdrew her smile and leapt at a jotunn before her, opening a windhole within its chest.
as if to be an even greater burden, she sliced and cleanly disposed of another jotunn to its side, making a display of it for flungruni.
the cross-section sigurd had cut was so glossy, it reflected the sunlight like glass.

name: sigurd
normalized: the same goes for you, flungruni.
you should have remained subservient in the underworldly plane, rather than letting loki put wind in your sails and acting like a leader.

name: sigurd
normalized: that foolish and unruly offensiveness… have you not realized, even after having your eye stolen by me?

name: flungruni
normalized: muu.
don't make a fool of mee!
flungruni's face quickly became warped in rage.
yes.
this jotunn had once had an eye pierced and smashed by sigurd.
after running 100 leagues and distinguishing its enemy, its eye, which it held the greatest pride in…
flungruni held back the thought, "i want to pound her to dust.
if he were to use gungnir, he could likely consign sigurd to a simple death.
the invincible spear gungnir, which had been the property of odin, was an intense and unparalleled weapon he could annihiliate his enemies with a single blow even with his eye closed.
any who had this weapon, no matter how incompetent a soldier, could become the ultimate, invincible warrior.
but as long as sigurd held the key, she must be captured alive.
flungruni was enraged because he knew from the previous battle that he could not win against her.

name: flungruni
normalized: someone!
someone must be here!
flungruni cried out in a fit of anger.
however, naught but silence continued.
and so it stood to reason that the supreme commander himself would turn his back on a one-on-one fight.
none would be fit to take on such an exceptionally strong valkyrie.
and so, while both armies watched with held breath…
suddenly, an emotionless voice echoed out.
i'll accept that challenge…
a commotion occurred.
there was a sound of chafing armor.
the denizens of hel and jotnar parted left and right, separating at the center.
and beyond, a single soldier appeared.

name: flungruni
normalized: …you're!?

name: sigurd
normalized: what!?
the jotunn, upon confirming the soldier's true identity, gave a look of surprise.
however, the more surprised one was sigurd.

name: sigurd
normalized: svia!?
sigurd, her face stuff in shock, called out the soldier's name.
that was, without a doubt, valkyrie svia.
her armor was emitting light.
for how short in stature she was, there was an overwhelming sense of intimidation about her.

name: svia
normalized: i'll be your opponent.

name: sigurd
normalized: svia… have you gone insane?
sigurd's voice was trembling in agitation.
she could come up with no reason why svia, who had vanished a month prior, would reappear and introduce herself as her opponent.

name: svia
normalized: it has been a while, sigurd.
even after seeing sigurd's complexion, svia's expression remained emotionless, as did her voice.

name: sigurd
normalized: have you betrayed us?
no, you would never…

name: svia
normalized: this past month, i've calmly analyzed the progress of the battle.
after doing so, i've decided that fighting you would be best.
svia declared thus to sigurd, with an unchanging, emotionless voice.

name: sigurd
normalized: what's the meaning of this!?
sigurd could not catch hold of svia's true intentions, and her voice grew irritated.
however, svia merely passed a fleeting glance her way, displaying no sentiment whatsoever, and offered no answer to sigurd's question.
and then, disposing of all expression and emotion, she turned head to flungruni.

name: svia
normalized: flungruni, if i were to defeat valkyrie sigurd, would you add me to your army?

name: sigurd
normalized: what was that!?

name: flungruni
normalized: wow.
what?
planning to turn traitor?
flungruni seemed to consider it for a moment, but had immediately thought, "this is good.
standing ahead of having any problem with svia turning traitor on the divine army, he thought that there was no greater happiness than the valkyries crushing one another.
coming to conclusions quickly was his strong point.

name: flungruni
normalized: what about the key?
your key?

name: svia
normalized: i'll just give that useless thing to you.
does that work?

name: flungruni
normalized: hm… uwaah.
very well.
however, don't kill her.
capture her alive.
a repulsive grin slung across his face, flungruni consented to svia's sudden proposal.

name: svia
normalized: so our negotiations are complete, right?
with an utterly unchnaging expression, svia again stared straight at sigurd.
within svia's eyes pointed at sigurd was the glitter of a freezing fighting spirit.

name: sigurd
normalized: why?
why have you betrayed the divine forces?
though she'd noticed svia's eyes, sigurd could not escape her own bewilderment.

name: svia
normalized: i cannot lose.
after all, if you take the fight away from me, there'd be nothing left.

name: sigurd
normalized: you're saying you betrayed the divine forces because you want to fight!?

name: svia
normalized: …haha.
accepting sigurd's exasperation, svia, who hadn't shown any emotion to this point, lost her composure for just a moment and showed a smile.
it was directed at the bewildered sigurd.
or perhaps she simply couldn't help but look forward to the battle that would soon begin.
and then--
the start was abrupt.

name: svia
normalized: …fuu!
svia drew her sword and suddenly struck at sigurd.
sigurd did not have the luxury of time to think.
she promptly prepared her own sword and took on the blow of svia's downswing.

name: sigurd
normalized: kuu…!
svia's blade, sharpened to a hair's breadth, and sigurd's mighty longsword collided with an unimaginable heavy sound, and sparks scattered.
after a violent and momentary offense and defensive, the two took distance from one another.

name: sigurd
normalized: you're insane!

name: svia
normalized: you took this single blow quite easily.
as i expected.

name: sigurd
normalized: i don't want to fight.
sigurd could not find the reason that they, both valkyries, must fight each other right here like this.
therefore, was it the girl she wished not to fight?
that had been how she felt until just now.
however, now that their blades had met, an interest was brimming within her.
towards this valkyrie svia--
towards this ruthless soldier whose thoughts she could not decipher--
for as long as this once peaceful land of the gods had existed, confrontations between valkyries outside of the stadium had been forbidden.
this was why sigurd thought that this might be a good opportunity to measure svia's physical strength, or possibly just satisfy her own curiosity.
tactics, martial arts, courage, quick-wittedness: svia was a combat-elite with abilities that excelled in all categories.
fighting against svia, even in this spot where she was fighting enemies, was a matter which sigurd felt should take priority.

name: sigurd
normalized: (i might just be a battle-maniac just like svia.
a smile came upon sigurd's face.

name: svia
normalized: hehe.

name: sigurd
normalized: i accept.
svia, don't regret it.
sigurd's voice was trembling in excitement.

name: svia
normalized: sigurd, let me give you some important advice.
don't go easy.
i'm aiming to kill you.

name: sigurd
normalized: yes, i'm serious, too!
this time, sigurd ran at svia like a tiger.
in response, svia did not move an inch.

name: sigurd
normalized: haa!
sigurd charged svia powerfully in a thrusting stance.
svia nimbly turned half her body and dodged sigurd's thrust.

name: svia
normalized: we're adept at reading each other's body language, but your intent is easy to understand.
though her armor had suffered a long, superficial scar, svia grumbled at length.
however…

name: sigurd
normalized: that goes for you as well.

name: svia
normalized: what?

sigurd's fist had struck her armor's flank.
sigurd has allowed her to read her intent on purpose, and while her opponent was focused on her sword, had driven her fist in.

name: svia
normalized: guu!
for the first time, svia's expression distorted.
however, she regained her posture in less than half a blink.

name: svia
normalized: fuu!
svia faced sigurd cool-headedly and swung down her sword from overhead.

name: sigurd
normalized: absurd!
sigurd saw through svia's sword and jumped back.

name: svia
normalized: as i would expect, sigurd.
only you could hit armor barehanded and cause an internal rupture.

name: sigurd
normalized: you as well, svia.
it goes to show how much authority you have with wielding a sword, even as you took that attack directly.
there was a faint diagonal scar across sigurd's chestplate.
if she had stepped out of the way a moment later, there was no doubt her chest would have been gouged out.

name: svia
normalized: i wanted to fight you.
that's why we're doing this.

name: sigurd
normalized: i might be unwilling, but if i think about it, i agree!

and they clashed head-on.

name: svia
normalized: fuu!

name: sigurd
normalized: haa!
with the loud echo of metalic clanks, a ground-quaking vigor pervaded the area.

name: sigurd
normalized: astounding.
fighting you like this… hm.
despite the circumstances, my heart is racing.

name: svia
normalized: you, too.

the two of them, brimming with joy, both displayed smiles.

name: flungruni
normalized: uwah, hahhahaa!

normalized: there is no chance for you, whose heart has been filled with wickendess, to win.

muster your wisdom and technique.

normalized: (svia, i want to beat you no matter what it takes.

normalized: ooh!

normalized: fmm!

name: sigurd
normalized: got you!

name: svia
normalized: what…

sigurd confirmed when svia would fall--

name: sigurd
normalized: ha!
took a short breath, then attacked svia's torso with a left side-kick.

name: svia
normalized: guu…!

name: sigurd

closed in upon svia, who was thrown through the air.

name: sigurd
normalized: ooh!

name: svia
normalized: …hehe.

yes, as if to say that.

normalized: impossible!?

that i was serious…

normalized: what was that!?

normalized: fu!

svia swung her right heel down intensely upon sigurd's stomach in a single blow.

name: sigurd
normalized: guu!
